description:
Kiri encounters Brutal while investigating the mysterious disappearance of monsters from various worlds. When Kiri rescues some Chaos Monster cards from Brutal`s clutches, Brutal challenges him to a Buddyfight and shows his true colors.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Overkill! Brutal of the Martial Arts!
逆天殺! 闘技のブルータル!!
